icarus.reactor

Class MajorComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • icarus.reactor.Component
      • icarus.reactor.MajorComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Condenser, Reactor

    public abstract class MajorComponent
extends Component
implements java.io.Serializable
    MajorComponent abstract class, used for components that can carry water/steam and have pressure and temperature
    Author:
    Team Haddock
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MajorComponent

        public MajorComponent(int steamLevel,
              double temperature,
              double pressure,
              double waterLevel,
              double failProb,
              int fixTime)
        Primary constructor for use when initialising a new game
        Parameters:
        steamLevel - The level of steam stored in the MajorComponent
        temperature - The temperature in Kelvin
        pressure - The pressure in Pascals
        waterLevel - The water level in cm
        failProb - The (maximum) probability of a component failing
        fixTime - The number of timesteps required to fix a component

      • MajorComponent

        public MajorComponent(int steamLevel,
              double temperature,
              double pressure,
              double waterLevel,
              double radius,
              double waterSurfaceArea,
              int height,
              double failProb,
              int fix,
              boolean functioning,
              boolean repairal,
              int fixingProgress)
        Constructor used when testing or loading a MajorComponent from a saved state.
        Parameters:
        steamLevel - the amount of steam in the component
        temperature - temperature of the steam in the component
        pressure - is the pressure of the steam in the component
        waterLevel - the amount of water in the component
        radius - is the radius of the container
        volume - is the volume of the container
        waterSurfaceArea - is the surface area of the water, used for calculations
        height - the the hight of the container
        failProb - The (maximum) probability of a component failing
        fix - The number of timesteps required to fix a component
        functioning - Whether or not the Component is currently functioning
        repairal - Whether or not the Component is currently being repaired
        fixingProgress - The progress on a current fix

      • drainWater

        public double drainWater(double amount)
        Removes water of the specified amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of water to be drained in cm.
        Returns:
        The amount drained, this is different from the specified amount if the MajorComponent contains less than the amount specified.
